name: Dragonsoul
resistance: one of the following: acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison

traits.name: Dragon Fanatic
traits.desc: The dragonsoul has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonsoul can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonsoul ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Fanatic Advantage
traits.desc: Once per turn, if the dragonsoul makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

traits.name: Limited Flight
traits.desc: The dragonsoul can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The dragonsoul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonclaw's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Dragonsoul attacks twice with its shortsword.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) damage of the type to which the dragonsoul has resistance.

actions.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (3/Day)
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (6d8) damage of the type to which the dragonsoul has damage resistance.
